segments.text: Dad , can I have a pet ? I did what you said and passed all of my exams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I guess you get to have a pet . Do you know what you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a dog . My friend Mindy's dog just had puppies and she said I can have one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know who will be responsible for feeding and cleaning and all of that stuff ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , I know . I will do it all by myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you figured out the costs involved with feeding and caring for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It will cost me about $ 50 a month . And I make a little more than that already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like you've done your homework . I think you're ready for this .
segments.speaker: S2
